snippet.title: Terra - A Terraria Demake Trailer (A Terraria Trailer Demake)
snippet.description:
Terra - A Terraria Demake is, as the name suggests, a demake of Terraria! 
Credits, links and more info below:
▼▼▼

Credits:
Video created by @user-r5q1w 
Terra music recreated by @Jo560hs 

Links to game:
https://cubeegames.itch.io/terra-a-terraria-demake
https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=44606

Terra was made in PICO-8, a fantasy console with strict limitations designed to enhance creativity.
https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php

This trailer is a parody of the original trailer for Terraria:
https://youtu.be/w7uOhFTrrq0

#terraria #pico8 #demake #pixel #pixelart #gameplay #gamedev #trailer
